sentences.cn: 有精密电子制导系统的导弹

sentences.en: Adam sought guidance from the Almighty.
Children need discipline, but they need guidance even more.
sentences.cn: 孩子要管, 但更要引导.
儿童需要道德上的引导。

sentences.en: guidance for teachers on how to use video in the classroom
sentences.cn: 对教师提供的课堂录像教学指导

sentences.en: I was looking forward to working under her expert guidance.
sentences.cn: 我期待着能在她的专业指导下工作。

sentences.en: I went down on my knees and prayed for guidance.
sentences.cn: 我跪了下来，祈求得到指引。

sentences.en: I went to a counselor for guidance on my career.
sentences.cn: 我去找了一位顾问给我作职业指导。

sentences.en: It is hoped you will give us guidance.
She often turns to the book for guidance.
Students may decide to seek tutorial guidance.
sentences.cn: 学生可以决定寻求导师指导。

sentences.en: The airplane has a sophisticated electronic guidance system.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机有一套尖端的电子导航系统.

sentences.en: The couple have sought help from marriage guidance counsellors.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇已经向婚姻指导顾问寻求帮助。

sentences.en: The guidance systems didn't work and the missile couldn't hit its target.
sentences.cn: 导航系统失灵，导弹未能命中目标。

sentences.en: The nation looks to them for guidance.
sentences.cn: 全国民众期待他们能够指引方向。

sentences.en: The sayings of Confucius offer guidance on this matter.
sentences.cn: 孔子的教诲为此事提供了指引。

sentences.en: You are cordially invited to come and give guidance.

trans.tran_en: help and advice that is given to someone about their work, education, or personal life
